document_data.name: Kanon
document_data.mainbody: '''Kanon''' was a resident of [[Elturel]] who was exiled from his home city along with other [[tiefling]]s during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He had light, red-grey skin, two large black horns, and wore a long grey robe.
document_data.Relationships: Kanon had one known sibling, a sister by the name of [[Arka]].
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, the Elturian tieflings were forced out of the city as refugees, forced to find a new home somewhere on the [[Sword Coast]]. They were were granted temporary refuge at the [[Emerald Grove]], by the a[[archdruid]] Master [[Halsin]]. The safe haven they received ended however when  a druid named [[Kagha]] tried to seal away the grove from the tieflings, by means of the ''[[Rite of Thorns]]'' [[ritual]].

When a band of [[goblin]]s chased the adventurers [[Aradin]], [[Barth]], and [[Remira]], away from the [[Shattered Sanctum]], they were brough to the doorstop of the [[Emerald Grove]]. The goblins launched a middling assault against the grove, and their archers managed to shoot down Kanon atop the walkway atop its massive front gate.
